Blog.post: i think that someones turning into a fake...i think that someone needs to get their act together and mature....and i think this someone isnt gunna
god school already AHHHHHH...i still havent done back to school shopping...guess its a lil late? haha theres always nxt weekend

that this person told me that I always lie...its like umm im ont the one who told HELLA secrets...i still have some of hers that i havent told...and im not the one who lied bout sending porn to ppl then gettting mad when it got out....she should be glad im not fucking putting those pics up on the INTERNET...which i could if i got mad enuf...

its so great when the person who is probly the WORST at keeping secrets gets mad at you for telling something that they didnt even tell you not to tell...well they did at one point...but THEN THEY were the one who hinted to the person that they cheated at camp...even tho camp doesnt count..but they were the one who told the person about the other person so when the person asks bout the other person...dont they deserve to kno...and its not like the cheater and person are even gonig out anymore or EVEN LIKE EACHOTHR ANYMORE....and besides...its not like my best friend knows how to keep secrets

so today i ran with claire...we saw rogers...how is it that he ALWAYS sees us when we run lol i guess its good he thinks were like insanely dedicated ahha...then i went home and hung out and went to loook for running shoes...i swear there like arent any anywhere!!! ahhhh!!! and i need some before monday!!!! lol so yeah then i went to fi's play and then it was over real quick it was good tho....FI U DID GREAT!!! but then my parents were like ooppp sorry were in the city LOL so me and adam hung out on solano...it was sweet that he waited with me...and then he was really freaked that lauren was gunna dump him but she didnt....yeah then my parents dropped him at bart after we dropped fis cell off for her and i totally fell on my face going up the stairs hahahahahha okay yeah....

so yesterday i went to SM for the freshman orientation, it was acutally really fun. jaimen is really really awesome... i mean he was cool on the yosemite trip but it was really fun to hang with him. me and fi redid the poster so if ur in the shea and u see a really awesome pic on the left when u come in from the cross courtyard just kno we made it!!! lol and we god t shirts and sweat bands ahhaha...i wore mine like a scrunchi and i put in on my leg anywhere but on my head....me and fi and jaimen got to ring the bells and it was reallky fun but boselli like fucked it all up so it was all off but we fixed it....and yeah. we got to see all the freshman including suckaroo!!!!!! hahah we got natasha to put a name tag on him that said hi my name is: suckaroo and he was like YOU and pointed at me and like tried to kill me..it was a fun day.. we were posed to hang wit collin afterwards but he had to pack or sumthin for san diego. so me and fi got pizza and it was fun. then i came home and then sop got blown off by EVERYONE so she came over and we hung out. we watched austin powers...i hadnt seen the first one!! it was cool we found some of my brohters porno it was hilarious and we listened to music...it was cool listening to all the songs i forgot i had and everything....we pigged out on cookie dough and popcorn and milk...it was really fun.... im reaching my goal...or i feel myself nearing...this years gunna be awesome.... ooo also im like obsessed with this song by the cure well 2 of then but i forget what ones called..and lovecats...

GO: yellow and green sippy bottle from jamba juice, yellow rhinestone cat coller, nail in my foot--> doctors, sixteen candles, fetta cheese, cds and magazines, cell phone, orange juice, together again with everyone, planners, hugging all the people i missed in the summer NO GO: blisters, parents, nail in foot, belts, schedrules, dress code, prayer, blabber mouth boselli, wind and cold, alarm clock, rachel this was pretty much my day well that and taking something out of my pocket when it looked like i had a tumor... HAHAH yeah RIGHT...
its going to be different THIS TIME so far im 1 to 1 :)

things seem to be goin my way...for now at least. its weird to think that im going to be seeing all those people again, most of whom i havent seen since last year. i mean i wonder how much they have changed. i kno that ive changed a lot during this summer- for once i dont feel totally naive. i wonder if im goin to get to kno different people and change who i hang with...well guess i wont kno till i see. people really do change in only a few months. i hung out with someone who was my other best friend and theyre a whole new person...and yeah its a good thing :) now, for my day. i went to an asb thing which was fun i think that this is gunna be a good way for me to expand my friends. then i went to solano and got "lunch" then i went to c's house and then i went to g's house and had dinner and played baseball and soccer and stuff- it was acutally really fun. today was a pretty awesome day when i look back at this summer its been totally insane-but its over now. and things are going to be different beacuse im different
ive also just begun having my fun. me and fi have planned to change the way things have been happening around here....were gunna show you...JUST wait
